author: Fatma Schwarz
title: Trump Claims Russia Probe Aims to Help Democrats in Midterms
text:
Home » Trump Claims Russia Probe Aims to Help Democrats in Midterms Trump Claims Russia Probe Aims to Help Democrats in Midterms May 29, 2018
Republican President Donald Trump broadened his condemnation of the Russia probe with a tweet Tuesday accusing it of being a partisan train that might unfairly tip the midterm elections in favor of Democratic congressional candidates. gtag('config', 'UA-114047264-2');
The “angry Democrats” who’re “working on the rigged Russia Witch Hunt, will be MEDDLING with the mid-term elections,” the president mentioned in his tweet.
Inside…
